unnormalised: Hey everyone! Choosing the right payment gateway is such a *jugaad*, isn't it? Like finding the perfect lehenga for Diwali! I remember my cousin, Priya, struggling with this for her saree business in Surat. Ultimately, she went with one that integrates easily with her Shopify store. Heard good things about Razorpay too. Maybe something they teach at IIM-Ahmedabad? I was humming "Ae Kya Bolti Tu" trying to figure it out at one point!
